availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Patterson Elmore. Father of William Elmore, James Elmore, Elizabeth Elmore, Joshua Elmore, Charles Elmore, and Thomas Elmore. Carpenter in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Livingston County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 387A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 275-6.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Livingston County Births, p. 657.
"Albert Elmore (unknown-1865)," Find A Grave, Memorial 74620810, accessed February 25, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74620810.
KYR-0001-029-0172.
